main event: An unidentified flying object was observed near Alexandria, Louisiana on July 25, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed on radar by ground personnel at England Air Force Base.
The object was described as larger than a star, red in color, and moved in a zig-zag pattern.
The object was observed for about 15 minutes before disappearing from view.
The sighting was evaluated as an unidentified flying object by AFOAT-4 (Air Force Office of Aerospace Tests).
Temperature gradient data was provided for various altitudes in a supplemental report.
witnesses: M/Sgt Robert F. Flyppsen and others at England Air Force Base
